snippet.title: Corsair`s Madness | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
ADD to our Steam WISHLIST now! --- https://store.steampowered.com/app/1829310/Corsairs_Madness/

As the captain of the pirate ship Sam, you will immerse yourself in the adventure tale of a mystical archipelago full of secrets and treasures. Using pirate skills and ancient artifacts, save the crew members scattered around the different islands and discover the dark secrets of a mysterious temple
